issue.title: Build problem with GDAL on osx

content.raw:
This also happens on gentoo. I believe the reason is that CMake finds the headers and generates the proper -I<dir> for the compiler, but since on Ubuntu GDAL's headers are in /usr/include/gdal, it works on Ubuntu and no where else. For instance, gentoo puts GDAL's headers right in /usr/include.

I'm currently testing this on Ubuntu 14.10 and gentoo; hope to send in a PR tonight.
